name: Ashton
text: Ugh! I lost again!

name: Eve
text: Told ya’! I’m wayyy better at this than you.

name: Nathan
text: It’s not our fault you spend three hours playing video games every day. Some of us have things to do.

name: Eve
text: Mhm, because I’m just the most booorriing person you’ve ever met.

name: Eve
text: Boring, boring, boring!

name: Nathan
text: That’s not what I meant…

name: Ashton
text: Hey Tiana, you good?

name: Tiana
text: Hm? Oh, yeah, just reading an article my sister sent me.

name: Tiana
text: You know the old middle school out by the swamp? Apparently they’re tearing it down.

name: Ashton
text: Which one’s that?

name: Nathan
text: The really old one that you drive by when you go to my house.

name: Ashton
text: Oh, got it. Good riddance, that thing’s falling apart.

name: Nathan
text: Been closed for so long, I can’t imagine why they kept it up.

name: Eve
text: Ha! It’s ‘cause everyone’s afraid.

name: Ashton
text: Afraid of an old school? What’s the worst thing they’ll find in there, asbestos?

name: Eve
text: More like evil spirits.

name: Nathan
text: Evil asbestos spirits?

name: Eve
text: No! I’m being serious. They tried to tear it down when I was kid and stopped because of all the paranormal activity.

name: Tiana
text: Mhm! That place is super haunted.

name: Ashton
text: Random haunted school? Yeah, sure, like I’d believe that.

name: Eve
text: It’s not random!

name: Ashton
text: Why though?

name: Eve
text: Ugh, you’re so annoying sometimes. A bunch of people went missing at the school, and they never found them.

name: Ashton
text: And you think…they’re haunting the school?

name: Tiana
text: I mean, my mom’s friend who worked on the first demolition said he saw something.

name: Nathan
text: Probably an asbestos induced hallucination.

name: Tiana
text: Asbestos doesn’t do that!

name: Ashton
text: Whatever, man. Doesn’t mean it’s real.

name: Eve
text: Sounds like you’re just scared.

name: Ashton
text: Psh, why would I be scared?

name: Eve
text: I don’t know, why are you?

name: Tiana
text: Leave him alone.

name: Nathan
text: Bet he’s scared of being wrong.

name: Ashton
text: I’m not scared of anything!

name: Eve
text: Oh, yeah? Are you? Then prove it!

name: Ashton
text: And how exactly am I gonna do that?

name: Eve
text: Hm...

name: Eve
text: Why don’t you go in there before it gets demolished?

name: Ashton
text: That’s the dumbest thing I’ve ever heard. No way.

name: Eve
text: What’ve you got to lose?

name: Ashton
text: Um, so much actually.

name: Eve
text: I dare you to.

name: Nathan
text: You know what, I dare you too. Take pictures.

name: Ashton
text: You’re not gonna let this go?

name: Eve
text: Nope.

name: Ashton
text: …fine. But if I’m right, you owe me twenty bucks.

name: Eve
text: Okay, but if I’m right, you owe me twenty bucks.

name: Ashton
text: Deal.

name: Tiana
text: I don’t know if that’ll be safe.

name: Ashton
text: If I can get her to stop calling me a coward and get twenty bucks out of it, I think it’ll be worth it.
